verbs.description: [ARG1: rugby player] [V: paralyzed] [ARGM-TMP: after eating slug on a dare the dare seemed simple] gross maybe but easy enough it was 2010 and 19-year - old sam ballard was with friends having drinks at a party someone found a garden slug and a gauntlet was thrown eat it i dare you the rugby player did n't back down centers for disease control and prevention rugby katie ballard ballard family maui ben manilla slug ndis eliza lape
